# Introduction

![](images/FKt230115-Falkortoo_Aerial-DepartingVigo-20230115-Ingle-0023-2.jpg){width="443"}

This book contains chapters on accessing data systems and understanding our science systems while onboard *R/V Falkor (too).* Our hope is that these documents will help during the cruise planning process, while onboard, and in the post cruise period.
